message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested but that's a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $95?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save a bit. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go.
